name: Emergency Shower Eyewash Station OSHA Approved,Eye Wash and Shower Combination Kit, First Aid Eyewasher Station for Industrial,Lab Use,ABS
short_description: 【PREMIUM MATERIAL】 - Our emergency shower and eyewash station is made of high quality ABS material, which makes it alkali and acid resistant, rust and corrosion resistant, anti-oxidation, long service life and easy to maintain.

【DOUBLE NOZZLES】 - The eyewash bowl with dual eyewash nozzles is designed to provide a clean and gentle spray for the eyes. Just pull the switch in emergency situation. There is a cover on each of the nozzle, which can prevent blockage.

【NPT Threaded Water Inlet and Outlet】 - We manufacture the threads of the water inlet and outlet as NPT threads, making it compatible with the customers' plumbing system and minimizing the risk of leakage as much as possible. Also, one roll of PTFE tape is included for plumbing sealing purposes.

【EASY TO USE】 - When any emergency situation occurs, just push the hand plate back or pull the shower rod down, and there will be plenty of water for eye wash or body shower immediately. There's no need for complicated training and no limit on water capacity, providing timely first aid to people.

【WIDE APPLICATIONS】 - The eye wash and shower combination kit can be able to deal with various emergency situations.Widely applicated in the lab, hospitals, factories, worksites , petrochemical, electronics, medical, and other industry fields.

name: Honeywell Fendall Pure Flow 1000 Eyewash Station, 7 Gallon Capacity, 15 Minutes Wash Time, 29" L X 30" H X 17-1/4" D - 32-001000-0000
short_description: PRIMARY EYE WASH STATION: 15 mins of uninterrupted pH-balanced saline eye wash with a flow rate of 0.4 gpm (1.5 L) to meet ANSI standards; superior to tap water which may have bacteria or contaminants
FAST EASY OPERATION: Uses quick-change 3.5 gallon (13.2 L) cartridges; sure-grip handle provides instant, simple activation; unique nozzle design delivers a soft “ribbon” of saline eye wash solution
SAFE & COST-EFFECTIVE: Factory-sealed, RFID-Enabled cartridges eliminate mixing, prevent contamination and simplify inspection; 2-year cartridge life saves time & money on replacements & maintenance
PORTABLE: No plumbing required allows for easy placement of eye wash station near most workplace hazards; can be mounted to wall with single bracket or made mobile with universal cart or stand
EASY MAINTENANCE: Captures waste fluid to eliminate spill hazards and simplify fluid
product_description: The Fendall Pure Flow 1000 Primary Emergency Eye Wash Station uses a 3.5 gallon (13.2 L) cartridge to deliver 15 minutes of uninterrupted flushing, with a fluid flow rate of 0.4 gpm (1.5 L) to meet current ANSI standards. The saline eye wash solution is purified and pH-balanced, which is superior to tap water which may contain harmful bacteria or contaminants. Operation is fast and easy for emergency situations as the sure-grip handle provides instant, simple activation. The unique nozzle design delivers a soft , gravity-fed “ribbon” of saline eye wash, leaving hands free to hold eyelids open. The nozzles cover a wide area around the eyes for effective removal of chemicals and particles. Since no plumbing is required, this eye wash station can be located near most workplace hazards. This allows your workplace to meet ANSI regulations which require an emergency eye wash station to be accessible within a 10-second walk of any hazard. Placement is easy as the unit can be mounted to a wall with a single bracket or made fully mobile when paired with a universal cart or stand. The Fendall Pure Flow 1000 is also extremely cost-effective: the 24-month cartridge life (from date of manufacture) is at least four times longer than other primary self-contained eye wash device, which saves time and money on replacements and inspections. The cartridge is also RFID-Enabled to simplify inspection, maintenance and inventory control, which helps support and strengthen workplace safety programs. Maintenance is easy as the factory-sealed fluid cartridges eliminate the need to mix & measure, and the opportunity for airborne particles or microorganisms to contaminate the fluid prior to use. The Fendall Pure Flow 1000 also captures waste fluid to eliminate spill hazards and simplify fluid disposal, and the integral valve at bottom allows easy draining of reservoir after use.

name: BPA Free Portable Eye Wash Station OSHA Compliant - Wall-Mounted First Aid Eye Wash Kit w/Mirror & 2X 16oz Empty Bottles - No Eyewash Solution Included - Emergency Eyewash - Set of 1
short_description: PORTABLE EYE FLUSH KIT: This is a portable eye wash station with all the parts you need to complete an emergency eye rinse (without solution). With a simple, compact design, you can take this whole eye wash kit with you between workplaces, ready for easy installation as a wall-mounted station or otherwise.

Our eye wash units feature the main station w/mirror, two empty bottles for saline or any eye wash solution, a large green emergency sign, and six screws for wall mounting the entire unit.

EASY USE: Performing an eye flush with our eye wash bottle is easy. The shaped eye hole's lid comes off with the flick of a thumb, then the solution is sprayed with a simple squeeze of the bottle, making an emergency eye wash smooth and safe. The bottle is easily removed for practical eyecare.

COMPLIANT DESIGN: Our products are vetted to ensure you pass any workplace inspections. Our eye wash stations are recommended by OSHA when a full eyewash station or safety shower is not immediately available, for preventing an emergency situation.

WORKPLACE ESSENTIAL: An eye wash kit is essential in a number of workplaces. You never know when you might have to perform a first aid eyewash on yourself or a coworker, especially if working on a building site, in a medical facility, a garage, a lab, or anywhere else with airborne debris.

name: TidyFriend Eye Wash Kit - Faucet Mounted Emergency Eye Wash Station Sink Attachment -1x Continuous Flow Eyewash Station,3X Common Sink Adapter,2X Inspection Tag,1x Emergency Eye Wash Station Sign
short_description: [Instant Eyewash Activation] Transform a compatible faucet eye wash station into a supplemental first aid eyewash station that can be turned on in under 1 second, delivering a continuous flow of water to flush out foreign materials during emergencies.

[Dual Functionality with OSHA/ANSI Compliance] Maintain your sink’s normal function while adding supplemental eye wash station that complies with OSHA/ANSI standards, our eyewash station ensures you're prepared for emergencies with a quick flip of a lever.

[Hassle-Free Installation with Adapter Size Guidance] Installs by replacing a removable aerator only. Includes 3 faucet adapters (15/16”-27T Male x 55/64”-27 Male, 13/16”-27T Male x 55/64”-27 Male, 3/4”-27T Female x 55/64”-27 Male), 2 inspection tags, and a 7" x 10" emergency sign. Explicit sizes added to prevent wrong faucet returns.

[Adjustable Eye Relief Wash Station] The swiveling eye nozzle offers customizable direction and water flow, providing targeted first aid to flush out dust, pollen, or chemicals with ease. Correct adapter selection, washer placement, and hand-tightening are required to prevent leaks.

[Faucet Compatibility Notice] Fits standard faucets with removable aerators and listed thread sizes only. Not compatible with pull-down, pull-out, sensor, square, or non-threaded faucets. Verify faucet type and size before purchase.
